alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:19AM CST until February 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, George and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 22 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
